entity.description:
This test project contains all common tests. It will be deleted when the split will be finished.
To run the test you need to run a component server.  
Testing documentation can be found [here](https://github.com/Talend/component-runtime/tree/master/talend-component-maven-plugin/src/it/web)  
Api documentation is [here](https://talend.github.io/component-runtime/main/latest/rest-openapi.html)
entity.name: tck-general-api-test

documentation endpoint

entity.description:
Folder of languages specifics tests  
The fall back and default language should be English (en),  
For now only the following languages are supported in most of the connectors:
 - English (en)
 - Dutch (de)
 - French (fr)
 - Japanese (ja)

The demo connector have the following:
 - Default (en)
 - English (en)
 - Ukrainian (uk)
 - French (fr)
 - Japanese (ja)
 - Chinees(zh)

Api documentation is [here](https://talend.github.io/component-runtime/main/latest/rest-openapi.html)
entity.name: languages

entity.description: Check the component language support for the endpoint component/list
entity.name: 1 - languages - component/index

The demo connector have the following:

 - Ukrainian (uk)
